headline: Truist announces second-quarter 2025 earnings call details
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) will report second-quarter 2025 financial results before the market opens on Friday, July 18, 2025. Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Bill Rogers and Chief Financial Officer Mike Maguire will host a conference call to review the company's financial results at 8 a.m. ET.

headline: Major Regional Bank Industry's Prospects Solid: 4 Stocks to Watch
summary: High funding costs, tariff-related uncertainty and poor asset quality will hurt the Zacks Major Regional Banks. Yet, interest rate cuts, modest loan demand and business restructuring will likely aid industry players like USB, BK, TFC & NTRS.

raw.headline: Major Regional Bank Industry's Prospects Solid: 4 Stocks to Watch
raw.summary: High funding costs, tariff-related uncertainty and poor asset quality will hurt the Zacks Major Regional Banks. Yet, interest rate cuts, modest loan demand and business restructuring will likely aid industry players like USB, BK, TFC & NTRS.

headline: U.S. Bank Tops Javelin Strategy & Research’s 2025 Mobile and Online Banking Scorecards
summary: Shortcomings Underscore Why Two-Thirds of Consumers Look Beyond Their Bank for Help with Their Finances 2025 Digital Banking Scorecard Results U.S. Bank earns Best-in-Class honors in both channels. Bank of America and Truist finished in second and third in mobile banking, while Navy Federal and Truist finished second and third in online banking. headline: PNC’s mobile branch manager braces for hurricane season
summary: “Our purpose is to make sure that we minimize any disruptions for the communities we serve, as quickly and as physically safely as we can do that,” Chris Hill said.
